name: Ariadne
description:
Someday this will be a something more... but for now, enjoy this little unpolished game in the style of Legend of Zelda.

Terrain from Micro Tileset.

Music by Azureflux.

Built using Phaser.

Find more projects at www.zenzoa.com.
